{"id":457608217,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1613660712,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/457608217/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"N/A","code":"static vector<bool> vis=vector<bool>(100000,0);\nstatic vector<int> dp=vector<int>(100000,100000);\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPerfectSquare(int x){\n        int s = sqrt(x);\n        return s*s == x ? true:false;\n    }\n    int backpack(vector<int>& item,int it,int remain){\n        //if(it<item.size())cout<<item[it]<<\" \"<<remain<<endl;\n        if(vis[remain]) return dp[remain];\n        if(it>=item.size()) return 100000;\n        for(int i=0;i*item[it]<=remain;i++){\n            dp[remain]=min(dp[remain],i+backpack(item,it+1,remain-i*item[it]));\n        }\n        vis[remain]=true;\n        return dp[remain];\n    }\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        if(isPerfectSquare(n)) return 1;\n        if(n<=3) return n;\n        vector<int> item;\n        vis[0]=vis[1]=vis[2]=vis[3]=true;\n        dp[0]=0; dp[1]=1; dp[2]=2; dp[3]=3;\n        int m=sqrt(n);\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            item.emplace_back(i*i);\n        }\n        backpack(item,0,n);\n        if(vis[n]) return dp[n];\n        return backpack(item,0,n);\n    }    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
